user.title: Asyncua OPC-UA Hub
user.description: Configure a connection to an OPC-UA server. Example URL: opc.tcp://192.168.1.100:4840

data_description.scan_interval: How often to update sensor values (default: 30 seconds)

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to OPC-UA server
error.invalid_node_id: Invalid OPC-UA node ID format. Use ns=X;s=... or ns=X;i=... (e.g., ns=2;s=MyVariable)

add_sensor.title: Add OPC-UA Sensor
add_sensor.description: Add a new sensor to monitor an OPC-UA node.

data_description.nodeid: OPC-UA Node ID (e.g., ns=2;s=variable or ns=1;i=12345)
data_description.device_class: Home Assistant device class (e.g., temperature, humidity, pressure)
data_description.state_class: State class for graphs (measurement, total, etc.)

add_binary_sensor.title: Add OPC-UA Binary Sensor
add_binary_sensor.description: Add a new binary sensor to monitor an OPC-UA node.

data_description.device_class: Home Assistant device class (e.g., door, window, motion)

add_switch.title: Add OPC-UA Switch
add_switch.description: Add a new switch to control an OPC-UA node.

data_description.nodeid_switch_di: Optional node to read the current state

add_cover.title: Add OPC-UA Cover
add_cover.description: Add a new cover (roller shutter) controlled via OPC-UA.

data_description.nodeid: OPC-UA node providing position or ID
data_description.open_nodeid: Command node set to True while opening
data_description.close_nodeid: Command node set to True while closing
data_description.stop_nodeid: Command node set to True to stop
data_description.travelling_time_down: Time from fully open to fully closed
data_description.travelling_time_up: Time from fully closed to fully open

add_light.title: Add OPC-UA Light
add_light.description: Add a new light controlled via OPC-UA.

data_description.nodeid: OPC-UA node to control light on/off
data_description.brightness_nodeid: Optional node for brightness control (0-100 scale)

add_climate.title: Add OPC-UA Climate/Thermostat
add_climate.description: Add a new climate entity for temperature control.

manage_entities.title: Manage Entities
manage_entities.description: Delete or modify existing sensors, binary sensors, switches, or covers.
